events.title: Mistral Worldwide Hackathon - San Francisco edition
events.reason: High-signal overnight marathon backed by NVIDIA and Mistral AI, attracting top-tier engineers.

events.title: Coding Agents: AI Driven Dev Conference
events.reason: Features founders of LangChain and other top dev tools; highly relevant to tech builders.

events.title: How AI-native unicorns scale
events.reason: Panel with leaders from Replit, Linear, and Harvey; elite networking with unicorn operators.

events.title: Funded Female Founders Summit
events.reason: Gathers 200+ venture-backed founders and 85+ VCs; high concentration of ambitious talent.

events.title: OpenEnv Hackathon
events.reason: Focuses on RL and base models with judges from Meta and Hugging Face; $100K prize pool.

events.title: Build with Intent: Leading Engineering with Eric Schmidt
events.reason: Extremely exclusive session with Eric Schmidt for technical leaders; highest possible signal.

events.title: Py AI Conference
events.reason: Features Python creator Guido van Rossum and creators of FastAPI/Pydantic; core tech signal.

events.title: Vibe Your SaaS: Startup Pitch Competition
events.reason: Powerhouse mix of industry-leading investors and forward-thinking SaaS founders.

events.title: the residency - demo day
events.reason: Spotlights elite founders driving $3B in value; high-caliber networking with unicorn builders.

events.title: PyTorch Helion Hackathon
events.reason: Deep technical focus on GPU kernels and PyTorch native tools; high signal for ML engineers.

events.title: AI+ Renaissance Conference 2026
events.reason: Flagship summit with 2,000 professionals and 40 AI pioneers; major networking event.

events.title: Unprompted: GTC Dinner with Modular & LlamaIndex
events.reason: Curated dinner for 40 technical leaders during GTC; high-density of expert talent.

events.title: Builders Welcome Party (GTC San Jose)
events.reason: The primary social hub for researchers and engineers kicking off GTC week.

events.title: -1 to World Labs with Dr. Fei-Fei Li
events.reason: Rare opportunity to hear from the 'Godmother of AI' at South Park Commons.

events.title: Llama Lounge 24 @ Google Deepmind
events.reason: Premier AI startup event series hosted at Google; excellent for meeting founders and VCs.

events.title: (un)official BSidesSF Rooftop Afterparty
events.reason: Large gathering of 300+ cybersecurity and tech professionals in a social rooftop setting.

events.title: ZeroClick Dinner for AI Builders & Operators
events.reason: Intimate evening for leaders shaping agentic AI; high-quality peer-to-peer connection.

events.title: The Agent Toolkit — OpenClaw Hack Day
events.location: AWS Builder Loft, San Francisco, CA
events.reason: Full-day sprint contributing to a massive open-source agent ecosystem; high builder signal.

events.title: AI Healthcare Conference at Stanford
events.reason: T.H.I.N.K. 2026 brings together top clinicians and tech entrepreneurs at Stanford.

events.title: The 1st OmOCon - oh-my-opencode Show & Tell
events.reason: Inaugural community event for a major open-source AI orchestration project.
